Sentencas: Solid Oxide Cells are potentially one of the most efficient energy conversion systems, yet unfavourable operating conditions may cause a performance drop.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: These electrochemical devices can be operated in reversible mode (fuel cell /electrolysers); therefore, they are suitable in chemical storage applications.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: However, reversible operation and inversion cycles further jeopardise performance stability.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: Advanced processing of experimental data such as Distribution of Relaxation Times (DRT) on Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) measurements is a powerful tool to investigate physicochemical processes occurring in Solid Oxide Cells and to analyse ageing mechanisms.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: This paper presents a method to identify the main processes behind polarisation losses in order to build an equivalent circuit model (ECM) suitable for real-time diagnosis based on EIS.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: The fuel cell operation is chosen as a reference for degradation detection and diagnosis.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: A comprehensive experimental campaign was executed on a commercial cell operated in fuel cell mode in a laboratory test apparatus by systematically varying operating temperature, current density, fuel flow and its composition.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: DRT deconvolution highlights five main processes, namely: oxygen transport and charge transfer in the anode, anodic diffusion, charge transfer at the cathode and cathodic diffusion.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: Therefore, the proposed ECM for the cell can be schematised as LR0(R(a1)Q(a1))(R(a2)Q(a2))W-FLWaG(R(c1)Q(c1)).
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: Beyond determining the model, a complete look-up table for the circuital elements is built thanks to EIS measurements fit.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution

Sentencas: This is a rich database for solid oxide fuel cell electrochemical performance simulation, and it allows the future implementation of the model in a useful diagnostic tool, even in the broader case of reversible operation in energy storage systems.
Titulo: An extensive model for renewable energy electrochemical storage with Solid Oxide Cells based on a comprehensive analysis of impedance deconvolution
